p.k: During the Cold War, MI6 spy Charles Thoroughgood is asked to revive his friendship with Russian diplomat Viktor Koslov with a view to 'turning' him. However, Viktor has his own agenda and reveals a shocking truth to Charles. UK (2013). Cast: Simon Russell Beale, Charlie Cox, Romola Garai, Olivia Grant, Christian McKay, Tessa Peake-Jones, Andrew Scott. Director: Pete Travis.
